content.text:
The Show Must Go On (Queen, 1991)

[Verse 1]
      [ch]Bm[/ch]
Empty spaces - what are we living for
          [ch]G[/ch]
abandoned places - I guess we know the score
[ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]F#[/ch]                       [ch]Em[/ch]
on and on, does anybody know what we are looking for?
        [ch]Bm[/ch]
Another hero, another mindless crime
           [ch]G[/ch]
behind the curtain, in the pantomime
[ch]Em[/ch]                  [ch]F#[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]
hold the line, does anybody want to take it anymore?

[Chorus]
                 [ch]Bm[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
The show must go on, the show must go on, yeah,
   [ch]Em[/ch]
inside my heart is breaking
   [ch]F#[/ch]
my make-up may be flaking
       [ch]Em[/ch]                     [ch]Bm[/ch]
but my smile still stays on.

[Verse 2]
         [ch]C#m[/ch]
Whatever happens, I'll leave it all to chance
        [ch]A[/ch]
another heartache, another failed romance
[ch]F#m[/ch]             [ch]G#[/ch]                       [ch]F#m[/ch]
on and on, does anybody know what we are living for?
            [ch]C#m[/ch]
I guess I'm learning, I must be warmer now,
             [ch]A[/ch]
I'll soon be turning, round the corner now
[ch]F#m[/ch]
outside the dawn is breaking
    [ch]G#[/ch]                                  [ch]F#m[/ch]    [ch]Em[/ch]
but inside in the dark I'm aching to be free.

[Chorus]
                 [ch]Bm[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
The show must go on, the show must go on, yeah,
   [ch]Em[/ch]
inside my heart is breaking
   [ch]F#[/ch]
my make-up may be flaking
       [ch]Em[/ch]                     [ch]Bm[/ch]
but my smile still stays on.

[Bridge]
   [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]
My soul is painted like the wings of butterflies
[ch]F[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]
fairytales of yesterday will grow but never die
[ch]C#m7b5[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]
I can fly - my friends.

[Chorus]
                 [ch]Bm[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
The show must go on, the show must go on, yeah,
     [ch]Em[/ch]
I'll face it with a grin
    [ch]F#[/ch]
I'm never giving in
              [ch]Em[/ch]     [ch]Bm[/ch]
on - with the show.

[Solo]
[ch]Bm[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]F#[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch]

[Outro]
     [ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]F#[/ch]
I'll top the bill, I'll overkill,
  [ch]Em[/ch]                             [ch]F#[/ch]
I have to find the will to carry on.
    [ch]Em[/ch]                [ch]Bm[/ch]
The show must go on.
